name: Leo and the Mermaid
description:
Play as Leo, this lost boy looking for his meaning in this world. Explore the oceans and caves alongside your mermaid friend.

Use “TAB” to switch between characters, and “E” to interact with the environment.

Credits: 

Production:
Hugo Saunders (2D  Character Art/ Animation)
João Filipe(Programming/ Project Managing)
José Castanheira (Environment Art/ Game Design)
